data.name: Web._grid.cmds.dlg_discardcheckout.aspx_discardTitle
data.comment: title for discard check out dialog [Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: Web._grid.cmds.dlg_discardcheckout.aspx_discardDescription
data.value: You are about to discard any changes made to the selected checked out file.
data.comment: title for discard check out dialog [Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: Button_Label_Confirm
data.comment: Button text for the Confirm Setup button [Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: Web._grid.cmds.dlg_editdocumentproperties.CreationInformation
data.comment: Created on and Created by information in edit document poperties dialog.[Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: Web._grid.cmds.dlg_editdocumentproperties.ModificationInformation
data.comment: Modified on and Modified by information in edit document poperties dialog.[Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: EditLocationDialogHeader
data.value: Create a new SharePoint folder or add an existing SharePoint folder as a document location in Microsoft Dynamics 365
data.comment: This text is used for header section in Edit location Dialog.[Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: EditLocationParentSiteLocation
data.value: Specify the name of the existing SharePoint folder here to associate the folder with this Microsoft Dynamics 365 record
data.comment: This text is used for parent site in Edit location Dialog.[Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: DocumentManagement.DefaultLocationName.Text
data.comment: Default value for location name in add location dialog.{NumberedPlaceholder="{0}"} Placeholder 0 is the index.[Category="Collaboration: Adding/Associating sharepoint locations to CRM records from UI"]

data.name: SharePointSiteError
data.comment: Create Folder Dialog[Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: Error_Message_0x80048054
data.value: The folder name contains invalid characters. Please use a different name. Valid folder names cannot ends with the following strings: .aspx, .ashx, .asmx, .svc , cannot begin or end with a dot, cannot contain consecutive dots and cannot contain any of the following characters: ~ " # % & * : < > ? / \ { | }.
data.comment: Error message for invalid characters.[Category="Collaboration: Adding/Associating sharepoint locations to CRM records from UI"]

data.name: DocumentManagement.AddLocation.FolderName.Maxlength.Exceeded
data.value: You have exceeded the maximum number of {0} characters limit in the folder name field.
data.comment: {NumberedPlaceholder="{0}"} Placeholder 0 is a number.[Category="Collaboration: Adding/Associating sharepoint locations to CRM records from UI"]

data.name: DocumentManagement.CreateFolder.GenericError
data.value: The action could not be performed.
data.comment: Error message shown to user if there is any other SharePoint error while folder creation.[Category="Collaboration: Adding/Associating sharepoint locations to CRM records from UI"]

data.name: Dialog_DeleteSharePointConfirm_Title
data.comment: Dialog page title for delete account confirmation dialog page.[Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: Dialog_DeleteAccountConfirm_Description
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete {0} {1}? You can't undo this action.
data.comment: Dialog page description for delete account confirmation dialog page. {NumberedPlaceholder="{0}","{1}"}. Placeholder 0 is a number representing the number of accounts selected and Placeholder 1 is a singular or plural account entity name (Account/Accounts) depending upon whether one or more accounts are selected.[Category="Orion AIR"]

data.name: Error_Message_0x8004700c
data.value: The specified display name is not valid.

data.name: SharePointUpdateFolder
data.comment: Update Folder Dialog[Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: SharePointUpdateFolderDescription
data.value: A folder with the same name already exists in this location: {0} Would you like to associate it with the current record?
data.comment: Update Folder Dialog[Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.comment: Create Folder Dialog[Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: OfficeDocumentsIntuneErrorText
data.value: We can’t open the selected file. Check to see if you have the app needed to open it. If you do and the file still won’t open, then it is likely because your system administrator has blocked the use of these types of applications.
data.comment: Text to display on a dialog when App is Intune Managed and policy is set to block opening of Office Documents.[Category="SharepointOnMoca"]

data.name: Upload_FileSizeGreaterThanMax
data.value: Maximum upload limit in Dynamics 365 is 50.00 MB. Larger files can be uploaded directly in SharePoint.
data.comment: Alert message when uploaded File size is more than 50MB

data.name: Brand_CRM_Short
data.comment: Branding for CRM Shortcut. [Category="Application Infrastructure"]

data.name: Upload_FileSizeLesserThanMin
data.value: The specified file is either empty or does not exist. Check that the file name is correct or specify a different file, and try again.
data.comment: Alert message when uploaded File size is 0MB

data.comment: Description for OneDrive confirm Dialog

data.value: Would you like to use this folder anyway?

data.comment: Label for One Drive dropdown header.[Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: SharedWithMe_Location_Title
data.comment: Label for shared with me dropdown header.[Category="SharePoint Document"]

data.name: OneDriveConfigLabel
data.value: Your files will be stored in the \{0} folder in OneDrive for Business.
data.comment: Description label in onedrive config dialog

data.name: OneDriveConfiguration_error_message
data.value: The action could not be performed. Please try reloading this page.
data.comment: Description label when error occurs in configuring OneDrive

data.name: OneDriveConfiguration_cancelled_message
data.value: We were unable to set your OneDrive for Business location as the process was cancelled.{0}This setup will start again on your next visit.
data.comment: Description label when user cancels OneDrive configuration.{NumberedPlaceholder="{0}"} Placeholder 0 will be replaced with ‘\n’ (new line character) in runtime

data.name: OneDriveBusinessSettings_EmptyFolderName_Message
data.value: Provide a folder that Dynamics 365 will use to store your personal files.
data.comment: OneDrive Folder Name Empty Alert Message [Category="OneDrive for Business"]

data.name: All_Locations_Title
data.comment: Displays All Locations option on the dynamic menu builder

data.comment: This text is used for the label of the parent site / location in Edit location Dialog.[Category="SharePoint Document"]
